General.Name: Ningbo Huaxiang Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Huaxiang Electronic Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells auto parts in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers real wood décor trims, real aluminum décor trims, BITs, floors, bumper frames, ABC pillars, reinforce crossbeams, metal thresholds, baffle shields, chassis, welding sunroofs, exhaust systems, rear mirror systems, fuel pump controllers, water pump controllers, LED modules, lamplet assembly, harness protection and air & fluids, battery tray, battery module plastic parts, e-box and busbar battery module plastic parts, battery packing cool systems, grille, fuel filler and power gates, spoilers, bumpers, windshields, and air inlet grills. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Ming Yang  Han
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
